author: IBM Technology
description:
Learn more about Generative AI here → https://www.ibm.com/think/topics/generative-ai

Scaling Gen AI to meet growing demand is a major challenge, but what if you could unlock new strategies to make it happen? By exploring innovative approaches to Gen AI, including batch-based systems, agentic architecture, and more, you'll gain a deeper understanding of the techniques being used to scale Gen AI.

AI news moves fast. Sign up for a monthly newsletter for AI updates from IBM → https://www.ibm.com/account/reg/us-en/signup?formid=news-urx-52120

title: Scaling Generative AI in 60 Seconds

author: IBM Technology
description:
Want to learn more about Generative AI + Machine Learning? Read the ebook → https://ibm.biz/BdGSDG
Learn more about AI Chatbots here → https://ibm.biz/BdGSRZ

Can a chatbot be too human-like? Martin Keen explores the question of how human a chatbot should be, and discusses the five key considerations that will help you understand the nuances of human-computer interaction. By understanding the nuances of human-computer interaction, you'll gain a deeper understanding of what makes a chatbot truly effective.

title: How Human Should an AI Chatbot Be?
